title: is it possible to get my account back
body: to keep it nice and short I used scripts on this acc and was immediately permanently banned, no warnings. this happened a while ago and i have gotten over it since but i still have yet to touch scripts. so i guess you could say ive reformed and i just want my acc back, my question is if that is possible. fully admiting that i was stupid to touch scripts please let me have the account back it holds so many memories

replies.body: An account that is banned for cheating (scripting) will never be unbanned. Cheating is an instant perma with no warning because it is a premeditated decision to go into games and ruin them for other people. There's no accidental cheating, there's no "I just had a bad game and got salty". It's a decision that you made more than likely knowing full well what the consequences would be when you were caught.

dont get me wrong. i know what i did was wrong and im not trying to say i was wrongly banned. im just wandering if there is anyway i can get the account back. considering ive reformed and will never and have never done so again

It probably came off harsher than I meant, but it was meant to answer your question. I just wanted to give you the why as well as the answer. Riot has a very harsh policy on cheating. No account that is permanently banned will be returned unless it's a false ban.

Nope not possible, the ban is on your account, so realistically you can keep using scripts, but your accounts are going to be the one taking the ban, so if you use scripts on an account that you have money in your kinda fucking yourself over.
ok, i thought so and never even bothered when it happened. thanks man
): it was like 9 months ago man
